Title: Alma C. Wilson to Axel Holm 1948.4.28
Description: CARBON COPY OF A TYPEWRITTEN LETTER FROM ALMA WILSON DATED APRIL 28 – 1948, PROBABLY TO AXEL HOLM.  NO ENVELOPE.
Creator: Alma C. Wilson
Siri Lawson, trans.
Text:
We have sent a letter to Stjørdals Banken as demanded  As no packages were sent to Gjertine And Olava like there has been to the rest of you there. john wanted them to be included now. but he forgot to write their names on when he wrote.  Now it looks like there’s only supposed to be 4  And when John Wrote to Eidum I guess he Had his own Reasons  It wasn’t me That time.

Received Herborg’s letter.  She’ll have to wait until another time for a reply  Mother And I Have both been sick  Grace is not well.  I think her working days are over

Regards to you all.

From Alma
